about_the_game:
NARWHAR Project Hornwhale is a 16-bit style action shmup that lets you explore levels freely, rather than forced scrolling.
Choose from two characters with different play styles and explore levels at your own pace, while experimenting with multiple weapon power ups.

Multiple difficulties (Easy/Normal/Hard/Yolo)

Choose how hard you want to be challenged, somewhere between infinites lives or just the one.

Different endings

Different difficulties means different ending, but which one is real?

Two characters

Choose between Aura and her offensive power of dash or Ukko and his defensive power of electro shield.

50 weapon variants

Bored of of shooters only having a few weapons, here have 50.

Passcode system for resuming play on Easy/Normal difficulties

Need to rest from playing, just pause and note down a simple passcode.
detailed_description:
NARWHAR Project Hornwhale is a 16-bit style action shmup that lets you explore levels freely, rather than forced scrolling.
Choose from two characters with different play styles and explore levels at your own pace, while experimenting with multiple weapon power ups.

Multiple difficulties (Easy/Normal/Hard/Yolo)

Choose how hard you want to be challenged, somewhere between infinites lives or just the one.

Different endings

Different difficulties means different ending, but which one is real?

Two characters

Choose between Aura and her offensive power of dash or Ukko and his defensive power of electro shield.

50 weapon variants

Bored of of shooters only having a few weapons, here have 50.

Passcode system for resuming play on Easy/Normal difficulties

Need to rest from playing, just pause and note down a simple passcode.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 64 bit (Ubuntu 18.04 or similar)
  • Processor: Intel i3 processor (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intergrated GPU - Intel HD 2000 (with WebGL support)
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux 64 bit (Ubuntu 18.04 or similar)
  • Processor: Intel i5 processor (Quad Core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU - GTX 560 1GB (with WebGL support)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: NARWHAR Project Hornwhale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 processor (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intergrated GPU - Intel HD 2000 (with WebGL support)
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit, Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 processor (Quad Core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU - GTX 560 1GB (with WebGL support)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: NARWHAR Project Hornwhale - the ray themed roaming 16-bit style action shmup.
